A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was inconsistent with the personalities of the characters that were established before this movie. The new characters also failed to be of any true interest except one at the beginning that doesn't last to the end. There were times when I also thought that I was watching two movies in one and the short one didn't look related to Star Wars. If this were another movie not connected to Star Wars I'd give this a 3/5 but I will stand with my rating I have given this which is less than 1.5/5.
